channel.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
channel.description:
I reackon moparscape should add a board for hosting some people cant host there servers and need them hosted and they go to a diffrent website just looking for hosters.. i dont know maybe this is a stupid topic but maybe it just might bring some more people into moparisthebest.com people that dont know how to port forward and just want a hoster and they spam all over the forums looking for one.. i think there should be a board so that people can find hosters well this is my opinon..
thanks for reading,Teh_codex

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board

This is retarded. We don’t need another board for something that stupid.

Rich:

If you can’t run it yourself, then purchase a dedicated server.

Topic would be nice :)[/quote]

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Sounds like an opportune moment of advertising. I say no personally (to the topic idea). A new board is completely out of the question. New boards will not be created until there are enough topics in this section to populate a new one. (forum game topics do not count)

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape should make a new hosters board

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

Yeah, it’s getting old. So many people on my sever want to know how to portforward. And this one kid said he can’t port forward cause he has a boot legged ass router to get free internet. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Seriously, people say they have no money. Or they’re just too lazy. Take $20 run to the store, and buy a pre-paid Credit Card. Then go to google.com and search $20 VPS.. Wow, you now have a working VPS for a whole month!

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

This probably won’t get accepted. There are to many people who would take advantage of this and “leak” sources which would lead to massive amounts of complaints.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape should make a new hosters board

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

With the addition of this board, another board would overload the moderators.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape should make a new hosters board

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This would be a bad idea as ‘Server stealing’ would first of all become a common problem, it is easier for somebody to spread the likes of bot nets, If somebody can’t host a private server they should be saving up for a VPS or a Dedicated server, this is not likely to happen.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape should make a new hosters board

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

How can a moderator ensure the protection of your source? You are the one giving the source to another member, and a moderator cannot control whether or not the other member will steal it.

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape should make a new hosters board

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

yes thats what i mean like say someone needs a hoster and they cant post anywhere else or it just gets locked people dont have money like $80a month on dedicated servers mayb someone thats why i suggested this maybe someone can say hosting servers $20 a month idk its just an idea…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2009, 09:35:03 am[/size][hr][quote=“total annihilation, post:1, topic:277344”][quote author=teh_codex link=topic=366000.msg2775848#msg2775848 date=1241530970]
I reackon moparscape should add a board for hosting some people cant host there servers and need them hosted and they go to a diffrent website just looking for hosters… i dont know maybe this is a stupid topic but maybe it just might bring some more people into moparisthebest.com people that dont know how to port forward and just want a hoster and they spam all over the forums looking for one… i think there should be a board so that people can find hosters well this is my opinon…

thanks for reading,Teh_codex
[/quote]

Great idea. Now, the only thing you have to worry about is source-stealing :P[/quote]

well im sure if they made the board they could easily get a moderator to mod the board to make sure no source stealing is going on…

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape should make a new hosters board
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Yes, and if you can’t afford to purchase a dedicated server (highly likely), you can always pay someone cheaply to host your server for you / on their vps?..
I think you should be allowed to pay for hosting from other members, or at least talk about it.

Read full topic
